data.fullContent: When raw animal milk is left standing for a while, it turns sour. This is the result of fermentation: lactic acid bacteria naturally present in raw animal milk turn the animal milk sugar into lactic acid. This fermentation process is exploited in the production of various dairy products.
data.answer: 生的动物奶放置一段时间后就会变酸。这是发酵的结果:乳酸菌自然存在于动物原料奶中，将动物乳糖转化为乳酸。这种发酵过程被用于生产各种乳制品。
